original_title: Marty Wilde - Born To Rock 'n' Roll
overview: A celebration of Marty's career performed live on stage at the London Palladium 27th May 2007.  There are guest appearances from Brian Bennett, Jet Harris, Justin Hayward, Brian Lic Locking, Hank Marvin, Big Jim Sullivan, Bruce welch, Roxanne Wilde, Kim Wilde, Wildcats.
title: Marty Wilde - Born To Rock 'n' Roll
